title: Killing Eve’s Villanelle sports painful bruise as Jodie Comer films series 3
text:
Jodie Comer was busy pictured filming Villanelle scenes for Killing Eve series 3 (Picture: Splash News)

Killing Eve’s Jodie Comer has been photographed filming a stunt scene for the hotly-anticipated third series of the multi-award-winning drama.

The actress, who plays stealthy assassin Villanelle, was seen dressed up in police gear as she shot late at night in London.

In one picture, Jodie covered her face with a white helmet and wore a high-vis jacket with a pair of jeans and black boots.

In-between scenes, the star was captured wearing a big puffer jacket and sported a rather suspicious-looking red bruise above her right eye.

Has Villanelle been involved in another accident with Sandra Oh’s Eve Polastri? Has she taken down another victim?

Only time will tell…

Jodie wore a high-vis jacket (Picture: Splash News)

The scenes were shot at night in London (Picture: Splash News)

The last chapter of Phoebe Waller-Bridge’s trail-blazer closed with an infatuated Villanelle pulling the trigger on her prey, Eve, who was presumed dead.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Plenty of fans were skeptical that Eve has been killed off, but it looks as though she’s alive and kicking as Sandra was spotted on set back in August.

How did she get that bruise? (Picture: Splash News)

Before that, the former Grey’s Anatomy star was caught in what appeared to be a chef’s uniform, puffing away on a cigarette like a member of the Royle Family.

Killing Eve was renewed for a third series back in April before the second chapter had premiered in the UK.

While details so far remain under wraps, it’s been confirmed that Suzanne Heathcote will be taking over from Emerald Fennell as showrunner.

I’m very excited that the Killing Eve baton is being passed onto another incredible writer for season three,’ Phoebe said of the news.

‘We can sleep soundly knowing these characters are safe in Suzanne Heathcote’s hilariously murderous hands.’
